trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed.
trans-unit.target: Anger orsak som en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> kontroll stängdes.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because an application was launched.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> kontroll stängdes på grund av ett program har startats.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because another application has received the focus.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> kontroll stängdes eftersom ett annat program har tagit emot fokus.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*> method was called.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> kontroll stängdes eftersom den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*>metoden anropades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because one of its items was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> kontroll stängdes eftersom ett av dess element har klickat på.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because of keyboard activity, such as the ESC key being pressed.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> kontroll stängdes på grund av tangentbordet aktivitet, t.ex på ESC trycks ned.
